posts.description: This album is the third album from The Smiths, release in June, 16, 1986. The Queen is Dead is a mark for The Smiths. Is the creative boom, been acclaimed until today. The album has a clime dark, dead, with much sadness, loneliness, depression, and reflection about life.
memorable: There Is A Light Never Goes Out

posts.album: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
posts.description: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band is the 8th album of the band. Release in May, 26, 1967 Sgt Pepper's became a phenomenon, with innovations in studio. Being the most sold album of band.
memorable: Lucy In The Sky With Diamonds

posts.album: The Dark Side Of The Moon
posts.description: The Dark Side Of The Moon was release in March, 1, 1973. The 8th album of Pink Floyd is only the 4th album most sold of all time. The cover of the album is iconic, the prism. The album approach has some messages, like time, greed, mental sickness and things about life
memorable: The Great Gig in the Sky

posts.description: DAMN. is the 4th album by Kendrick Lamar was released in April, 24, 2017. This album is the masterpiece of Kendrick Lamar with furious rhymes, and peerless storytelling abou Kendrick's destiny in America.
The 3th album by O Terno bring to us songs about life, relationship, question about personal life, and reflection. Was released in August, 25, 2016.

The 4th album of Cage The Elephant was released in December, 18, 2015. This album has simple songs that stay in the head. They wanted be transparent in this album, and capture the feeling in each song.
Thriller is the second album by Michael Jackson. Was released in November, 30, 1982. This album is the most sold in the world until now. Thriller is a phenomenon, all the 9 songs is amazing.
This is the 10th album by Pink Floyd, was released in January, 23, 1977. This album approaches the work of George Orwell, Animal Farm. The book is a satire of URSS.
This is the 3th album by Blood Orange. Release in June, 28, 2016 this album bring questions about racism, preconception.
This first album by Tim Bernardes, member of 'O Terno', was released in September, 26, 2017. This album bring sorrows, questions about relationship, and things about life.
